name: Color Blind
description:
Using ColorBlind Plugin get accurate and realtime simulation of your designs based on the type of disorder you have selected.


Steps to use:

  1. Select any single frame/group/element.
  2. Open Color Blind Plugin.
  3. Select the type of disorder from the dropdown.
  4. Preview your designs.


Algorithm Credits:

  • https://github.com/MaPePeR/jsColorblindSimulator developed by MaPePeR
  • Coblis
